Watch live: EP debate on June European Council on growth, jobs and EMU deepening just started.  http://t.co/bZud1QMjQa
Restoring lending to SMEs, to the economy, remains an absolute priority. We need solutions for businesses with solid business plans. #euco
.@EUCommission leaves no stone unturned to solve this social crisis and address unemployment.
Over 16 billion euro from structural funds has been reallocated in eight member states thanks to Youth Action teams of @EU_Commission.
We should concentrate funding from new Youth Employment Initiative under the new EU budget to the years 2014, 2015 and 2016.
I urge Member States to accept the justified requests of the European Parliament for flexibility in future budget 2014-2020. #euco #MFF
Financing to the economy: A European consensus will help restore confidence, break the vicious circle and boost economic activity.
Need to provide companies with alternatives to bank loans - e.g. private equity, risk-sharing instruments with EIB.  Proposal forthcoming.
Pooling of resources envisaged from struct funds, Horizon 2020, COSME and EIB/EIF and other public banks to increase lending to SMEs.
We need to complete and fully enact the Compact for Growth and Jobs, including important measures to strengthen the internal market .
Need to build a European consensus around immediate priorities: employment and financing of the economy, built on practical steps.#euco
1/ continue fiscal consolidation with a pace that reflects the situation in each country, focused on structural deficits. #euco
2/ intensify in parallel efforts on the implementation of structural reforms. #euco
3/ Because struct measures take time, specific focused action needed to deliver short-term results for the unemployed,  esp. the young.#euco

Today, I attended the presentation of our file to host Expo 2020 at the International Exhibition Bureau in Paris.
We have all the ingredients that qualify us to host this international event .. Optimistic as usual .. And our team made a distinguished presentation
The Expo 2020 has never been held in the Middle East, Africa or Southeast Asia. We expect 25 million visitors to visit the exhibition.
We will fulfill our promise during the exhibition to gather the best minds to make a better future for all .. We will organize the best course in the history of the exhibition ..
Cda will work w / Peru & Tanzania, to increase transparency and strengthen governance in their natural resources sector. http://t.co/urhMkUFQ5n
I am attending #TEDGlobal and it has been inspiring.

Attended today the presentation of our bid to host Expo 2020 at the BIE office in Paris
We have what it takes to host this important international event. I'm optimistic as usual and our team wave an excellent presentation
Never was Expo held in the Middle East, Africa or Southeast Asia before. We expect 25 million visitors to this global event
We will keep our promise in connecting great minds to build a better future and we will organize the best event in the history of World Expo

Today I met the French Prime Minister and discussed the development of relations between our two countries in the economic, tourism and cultural fields http://t.co/eKk5RjlfMs
We are France's leading economic partners in the region. There is cooperation in the fields of defense, renewable energy, nuclear energy, cultural and scientific affairs.
Our relations with the French Republic are old and deep. It is a friendly and allied country. The common and strong interests between our two peoples strengthen and strengthen this relationship.
Today deliver the Law initiative to Congress to reduce vehicle circulation tax by 50%. http://t.co/T5eWRi5ceY
I also presented the Prime Minister with a copy of my visionary book, in which we summed up our development perspective in the race for leadership http://t.co/bvUSyAJnOU
I met the Prime Minister of France .we discussed ways to enhance relations in economic, tourism and cultural domains http://t.co/dn8d7Wri8S
We're the leading economic partner of France regionally. We cooperate in defense, renewable & nuclear energy, cultural & scientific affairs
Our relations with France go back a long way. France is our friend & ally. The common interests between our ppl strengthen this relationship
I gave a copy of my book "My Vision" to the Prime Minister. It highlights our approach towards a national excellence http://t.co/Zd78lgqxaK
Fielded questions from reporters today while in London http://t.co/FuRGaYsEwR #cdnpoli #uk
Today we present the constitutional reform that establishes the compulsory nature of Kindergarten, to incorporate almost 16 thousand children at this level.
It also establishes the universal subsidy, to guarantee free access to all children, from 3 years of age to pre-school education
The bombing of Syrian helicopters is a violation of Lebanon's sovereignty and contravenes the treaties and affirms Lebanon's right to take measures to defend its sovereignty and protect its citizens
I was happy to meet a group of our students in France .. I was happy with the spirit of will and determination in their eyes http://t.co/hQCL1Ol67r
They are our children, our ambassadors and the best of our representatives there. . They are also the pride of their people and builders of the future in their country ..
Their goal is to trust themselves, to be optimistic and positive, to love the first place as they love their country's soil, because the UAE deserves first place
Happy to have met some of our students in France. I was impressed with their strong will and determination http://t.co/vFOn3PmeCU
They are our sons and daughters, our Ambassadors & representatives. We are proud of all of them ..
I told them to believe in themselves .. to be optimistic & positive about their future .. and to love their country, because UAE describes it

With the law that we released on November 12, 2012, we got 14 provinces to the status of Metropolitan Municipality.
We, AK Party, have taken the opposite of the idea of ​​punishing places where we do not vote.
As soon as the ballot boxes were closed, we put an immaculate Turkey map. We looked at all Turkey with an eye to 76 million.
President John #Mahama ranked among the top 10 best performing #African Presidents by #Kenya 's Nation Media Group.
What does KÖYDES mean? There is no such practice in the history of the Republic. We took the service to the villagers.
We provided extra services to the municipalities with BELDES. Why did not the people before us come to mind? Because their service was not concerned.
We did not get a deputy from Tunceli, but when you go there you will see universities, roads, hospitals.
But the CHP, which received the most votes from Tunceli, has not brought as much service as we have.
President John #Mahama is in #London #UK at the invitation of #British #PrimeMinister David #Cameron.
Although we do not have any deputies in Hakkari, you will see the services provided by looking at hospitals, roads and schools.
Antalya and İzmir have received the biggest investments of the Republican history in our period for voting or giving us.
We said we would not do regional nationalism. All of the 81 provinces are ours, brothers, vats.
In 2001 we said that we will take regional nationalism under our feet. From that day onwards we came up with this understanding.
We will not change this union, our brotherhood. We will not use these discourses for the slogan, we will try to fill in.
I stand before you as the mayor of a city like Istanbul.
I understand your problem best. Does Kılıçdaroğlu know? Do they know the garden? Put 5 of them in their hands and lose them, they come back.
The AK Party has set the rule for three terms during the establishment. Which party is there. We made the election age of 30 years old to 25 years old.
I gave instructions and this work continues to reduce this to 18 years old. Now the opposition says that we are going to leave the country a child.
We are the only party that opens the way to parliament by relying on its youth. There is a precedent, there is Fatih who sets off the dark ages and starts the light era.
We will decipher the games played on Turkey in documents that start in Taksim and continue throughout the country.
We're going to have two gigantic rallies this weekend. At these rallies we will be the voice of silent masses.
Someone from the EU says he has made some decisions about us.
I do not know the decisions the EU made about us.
Those who make decisions first look at Greece. Turkey is not a member of the European Union. How are you going to make a decision about us.
AKM was cleaned, the monument was cleaned. Our police will continue to do their duty. This is a state of law everybody has to comply with this rule.
They light up the municipal buses and pose on those buses. That name can not be a fight for freedom.
I tell your sincere environmentalist brothers that you leave and leave us alone with the members of that extreme terrorist organization.
And we will clean the Travel Park.
I talked about 2 billion 800 million saplings, the leader of the opposition party is calculating.
They are not trees but seedlings. You are already a tree of nursery, and the tree is a tree.

Today I met with French President François Oland and discussed the development of relations between our two countries in all fields http://t.co/5Wc2L5vYAF
We also discussed a set of regional files and the situation in the Arab region. There is consensus in our positions on many of these files
Our relations with the French Republic are ancient and laid back by Sheikh Zayed, may God have mercy on him. This relationship is based on openness, dialogue and cooperation
Our relations include economy, tourism, education, culture and military cooperation. At the last visit to Oland we decided to increase trade exchange 50% within 5 years
Met today with the French President François Hollande to discuss development of bilateral relations in all areas. http://t.co/U9Skb998ay
We discussed & reached common understanding on a number of regional & Arab matters
Our relations with France go back in time & are based on the principles of openness, dialogue & cooperation, as set by Sheikh Zayed.
We cooperate in economy, tourism, education, culture & military. In Hollande's recent visit, we decided to increase trade by 50% in 5 yrs.
